topic.title: i suggest to add wildcard character for zeronet names in next version.
topic.body:
i suggest to add wildcard character for zeronet names in next version.
ex：
*.zero.bit → 1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D

thks

1_1L6Gmgy4Lo4Z5jXqB6tnjr3jdPKFhfTSCz.body:
> [kai0](#comment_250_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv): use two tab

i have to say,it is a idea,is there any better way?

im exploring it,i have to say it is a nice job. i think zeronet will get more and more better

and the zeromedium.bit have already expired,i think you should get it as soon as you can.

> [lingdu](#comment_5_1DV1kbtG2Gqjp4WayjTjLmuf4gMF4zDvzc): im exploring it,i have to say it is a nice job. i think zeronet will get more and more better [...]

if you have not anyname coins,i can help you to register it,it is free. my zeromail is lingdu

1_18D4VdqDgiiykHZFvSRT1EtZ18pbHeYfMx.body:
> [nofish](#comment_1017_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Thanks for the link. Now I know why did we got 150 starts on github today :)

i suggest to add wildcard character for zeronet names，pls.
ex：
*.zero.bit → 1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D
it is easy to do it.

> [rwxy](#comment_2_1G2KAr146veEMjvkrhD3sXMUH1fAuZdswM): 为什么零网不抗墙？ 能简单说下原理吗

那天不是给你说了么，零网用了tracker服务器来发现节点的..封了那几个不就完了
不过，启动零网客户端时可以指定tracker服务器。
